content: the purl side of work on the left needle the right leg of the wrap should be in front of the needle then knit it through the back loop knit the next st the st that was wrapped so from each wrapped st you will get 2 st continue working w&t in this manner until you have finished all wrapped st and reach the last st on the left needle with the right needle lift the st below the next st onto the left needle and knit it slip it back on the left needle this is a double st turn work purl side should face you purl to marker sm p 6 to first w&t st with the right needle lift the wrapped yarn bar closest to you on the left needle the left leg of the wrap should be in front of the needle then purl it through the back loop purl the next st the st that was wrapped continue working w&t st in this manner until you have finished all wrapped st and reach the last st with the right needle lift the st below the next st onto the left needle and purl it slip it back on the left needle this is a double st turn work you should have this st count 1 double st 18 18 20 20 st 6 st - marker 6 st 18 18 20 20 st 1 double st knit side should face you now follow these steps a k to marker sm k6 ssk turn b sl1 p to marker sm p 6 p2tog turn c sl1 k to marker sm k to the gap ssk turn d sl1 p to marker sm p to the gap p2tog turn repeat steps c and d until you have this count 1 double st 9 9 10 10 st 6 st marker 6 st - 9 9 10 10 - 1 double st with work as it is right side facing you k to marker remove marker return held slipped st from the instep back to the heel i e 2 3 3 4 st from each side resume knitting in the round knit the double st as one when you get to it gusset decreases stitch count instep 30 32 34 36 and sole 36 38 40 42 bor at the beginning of instep knit 4 round as established in patt for instep and stockinette on the sole 1st decrease k1 k2tog k30 32 34 36 ssk k1 knit 4 round as established in patt for instep and stockinette on the sole please do not sell distribute copy etc this pattern without permission @4crinialbi 3 unexpected day off by rodica iosif 2nd decrease k1 k2tog k28 30 32 34 ssk k1 knit 4 round as established in patt for instep and stockinette on the sole 3rd decrease k1 k2tog k26 28 30 32 ssk k1 now you should have the original number of st for your size half
